mapper.sql: regionscheduleid, bindtype, bindid, regionid, playmode, playdate, starttime, endtime, objtype, objid, taskid, createtime
mapper.select: select * from medialist where '${objtype}' = '1' and medialistid = '${medialistid}'
select * from text where '${objtype}' = '2' and textid = '${textid}'
select * from stream where '${objtype}' = '3' and streamid = '${streamid}'
select * from dvb where '${objtype}' = '4' and dvbid = '${dvbid}'
select * from widget where '${objtype}' = '5' and widgetid = '${widgetid}'

select
from regionschedule where bindtype = '${bindtype}' and bindid = '${bindid}' and regionid = '${regionid}'
and playmode = '${playmode}'
and playdate >= '${fromdate}'
and playdate <= '${todate}'
order by playdate, starttime
mapper.delete: delete from regionschedule where bindtype = '${bindtype}' and bindid = '${bindid}'
mapper.insert:
